attributes.additional_details:
Since its introduction in 2009, more than 16.4 million people have joined the NHS Organ Donor Register.

But so many people in the UK haven't yet got around to signing up? Why don't we simply have an automatic inclusion policy which removes a national shortage, save thousands of lives each year,  preserve the memory of the donor which would bring comfort to the familes?

In a nutshell; more lives can be saved and transformed...Simples :-)
